xpath-ui-element.description: Checkbox blocked for learners in field Read only (download)

parameter.name: fieldsetLegend
parameter.description: save access for the specified fieldset

xpath-ui-element.name: saveReadOnly
xpath-ui-element.description: save button tab access read only

xpath-ui-element.description: Show preview of attached single page

xpath-ui-element.description: topic authors have to accept participants

xpath-ui-element.description: save configuration - cannot use generic button
